mapper.select: SELECT wf.`ID` as dpcoiWoOrderFileId, wf.`CREATE_BY` as createBy, wf.`CREATE_DATE` as createDate, wf.`wo_file_state` as woFileState, fileInfo.`FILE_ID` as fileId, fileInfo.`FILE_NAME` as fileName, fileInfo.`FILe_TYPE` as fileType, fileInfo.`FILE_ALIAS` as fileAlias, fileInfo.`EXCEL_PDF_NAME` as excelPdfName, DATE_FORMAT(fileInfo.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS fileCreateDateStr, (select users.`USER_NAME` from sys_users users where users.`USER_ID` = fileInfo.create_by) as createByName from dpcoi_wo_order_file wf, file_upload fileInfo where wf.`FILE_ID` = fileInfo.`FILE_ID` and wf.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and wf.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` = #{dpcoiWoOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT fileInfo.`FILE_ID` AS fileId, fileInfo.`FILE_NAME` AS fileName, fileInfo.`FILe_TYPE` AS fileType, fileInfo.`FILE_ALIAS` AS fileAlias, fileInfo.`EXCEL_PDF_NAME` AS excelPdfName, DATE_FORMAT(fileInfo.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS fileCreateDateStr, (SELECT users.`USER_NAME` FROM sys_users users WHERE users.`USER_ID` = fileInfo.create_by) AS createByName, (SELECT MIN(dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE`) FROM dpcoi_wo_order_file dwof, dpcoi_wo_order dwo WHERE dwof.`FILE_ID` = fileInfo.`FILE_ID` AND dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` = dwof.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` AND dwof.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' AND dwof.`wo_file_state` = 1) AS dpcoiWoOrderType FROM file_upload fileInfo WHERE fileInfo.`FILE_ID` IN (SELECT DISTINCT(fileInfo.`FILE_ID`) FROM dpcoi_wo_order_file wf, file_upload fileInfo, dpcoi_wo_order dwo WHERE wf.`FILE_ID` = fileInfo.`FILE_ID` and wf.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` = dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` AND wf.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' AND wf.`wo_file_state` = 1 AND dwo.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = #{dpcoiOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

select count(1) FROM dpcoi_order dor, dpcoi_wo_order dwo, dpcoi_wo_order_file dwof, file_upload fu
dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = dwo.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AND dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` = dwof.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` AND dwof.`FILE_ID` = fu.`FILE_ID` AND dor.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' AND dwo.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' AND dwof.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_TYPE` in (1, 2)
and dor.`VEHICLE_NAME` like CONCAT('%',#{vehicleName},'%')
and dor.`PRODUCT_NO` like CONCAT('%',#{productNo},'%')
and dor.`HOPE_CUTTING_DATE` = #{hopeCuttingDate}
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{realCuttingDateStart,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{realCuttingDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`RELEASE_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{releaseDateStart,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`RELEASE_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{releaseDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and fu.`FILE_NAME` like CONCAT('%',#{fileName},'%')
and EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM task_order_info info WHERE info.`TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID` = '1' AND info.`ORDER_ID` = dor.`TASK_ORDER_ID` AND info.`task_info_value` like CONCAT('%',#{taskOrderNo},'%'))
and dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` = #{dpcoiWoOrderType}
AND dor.`DESIGN_CHANGE_NO` like CONCAT('%',#{designChangeNo},'%')
AND dor.`product_line` like CONCAT('%',#{productLine},'%')

SELECT dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AS dpcoiOrderId, dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_STATE` AS dpcoiOrderState, dor.`ISSUED_NO` AS issuedNo, dor.`VEHICLE_NAME` as vehicleName, dor.`PRODUCT_NO` as productNo, dor.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE` as realCuttingDate, dor.`RELEASE_DATE` as releaseDate, dor.`DESIGN_CHANGE_NO` as designChangeNo, dor.`product_line` as productLine, dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` AS dpcoiWoOrderId, dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` AS dpcoiWoOrderState, dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` AS dpcoiWoOrderType, (SELECT info.`task_info_value` FROM task_order_info info WHERE info.`TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID` = '1' AND info.`ORDER_ID` = dor.`TASK_ORDER_ID`) AS taskOrderNo, fu.`FILE_ID` AS fileId, fu.`FILE_NAME` AS fileName, fu.`FILe_TYPE` AS fileType, fu.`FILE_ALIAS` AS fileAlias, fu.`EXCEL_PDF_NAME` as excelPdfName FROM dpcoi_order dor, dpcoi_wo_order dwo, dpcoi_wo_order_file dwof, file_upload fu
dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = dwo.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AND dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` = dwof.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` AND dwof.`FILE_ID` = fu.`FILE_ID` AND dor.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' AND dwo.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' AND dwof.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_TYPE` in (1, 2)
and dor.`VEHICLE_NAME` like CONCAT('%',#{vehicleName},'%')

and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`RELEASE_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{releaseDateStart,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`RELEASE_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{releaseDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and fu.`FILE_NAME` like CONCAT('%',#{fileName},'%')
and EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM task_order_info info WHERE info.`TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID` = '1' AND info.`ORDER_ID` = dor.`TASK_ORDER_ID` AND info.`task_info_value` like CONCAT('%',#{taskOrderNo},'%'))
and dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` = #{dpcoiWoOrderType}
